2017-04-01.name: Boku no Hero Academia (2017)
2017-04-01.desc:
* Based on super hero manga series written and illustrated by Horikoshi Kouhei

In a world where eighty percent of the population has some kind of super-powered quirk, Izuku was unlucky enough to be born completely normal. But that won't stop him from enrolling in a prestigious hero academy. Now, the promising freshman class is making its debut at the world-renowned U.A. Sports Festival! It's Quirk versus Quirk as our young heroes face off in the ultimate showdown.

Source: crunchyroll

Note: Episodes 1-3 were shown at a special preview showing held on March 28, 2017.

2017-04-01.name: Future Card Buddyfight Batzz
2017-04-01.desc:
* Based on super hero manga series written and illustrated by Horikoshi Kouhei

In a world where eighty percent of the population has some kind of super-powered quirk, Izuku was unlucky enough to be born completely normal. But that won't stop him from enrolling in a prestigious hero academy. Now, the promising freshman class is making its debut at the world-renowned U.A. Sports Festival! It's Quirk versus Quirk as our young heroes face off in the ultimate showdown.

Source: crunchyroll

Note: Episodes 1-3 were shown at a special preview showing held on March 28, 2017.

2017-04-01.name: Shingeki no Kyojin Season 2
2017-04-01.desc:
Many years ago, the last remnants of humanity were forced to retreat behind the towering walls of a fortified city to escape the massive, man-eating Titans that roamed the land outside their fortress. Only the heroic members of the Scouting Legion dared to stray beyond the safety of the walls – but even those brave warriors seldom returned alive. Those within the city clung to the illusion of a peaceful existence until the day that dream was shattered, and their slim chance at survival was reduced to one horrifying choice: kill – or be devoured!

Source: crunchyroll

2017-04-02.name: Alice to Zouroku
2017-04-02.desc:
* Based on the seinen manga by Imai Tetsuya.

A group of young girls possesses a mysterious power which gives them the ability to materialize their thoughts. Detained and experimented upon, these youths are locked away in secret until one of them manages to escape. Her name is Sana — a girl with the power to ignore the very laws of physics. When this wilful powerhouse crosses paths with a stubborn old man named Zouroku, his carefully-ordered life will never be the same again!

Source: crunchyroll

2017-04-02.name: Furusato Meguri Nippon no Mukashibanashi
2017-04-02.desc:
Like in any culture, Japanese kids grow up listening to the stories repeatedly told by their parents and grandparents. The boy born from a peach; the princess from the moon who is discovered inside a bamboo; the old man who can make a dead cherry tree blossom, etc. These short stories that teach kids to see both the dark and bright sides of life have passed traditional moral values from generation to generation.

Source: crunchyroll

2017-04-02.name: World Fool News Part II
2017-04-02.desc:
All sorts of things that happen all the time (?!) in the day-to-day dealings of a local TV station.

Life has been relatively peaceful (?!) for the staff of World Fool News since the addition of the new newscaster, Takahashi Ichitarou. But now, a new crisis is upon them...

Source: crunchyroll

2017-04-03.name: Beyblade Burst God
2017-04-03.desc:
All sorts of things that happen all the time (?!) in the day-to-day dealings of a local TV station.

Life has been relatively peaceful (?!) for the staff of World Fool News since the addition of the new newscaster, Takahashi Ichitarou. But now, a new crisis is upon them...

Source: crunchyroll

2017-04-03.name: Sekai no Yami Zukan
2017-04-03.desc:
The anime is an omnibus short format that will tell stories of the strange and bizarre in our world, including UFOs, cryptids, curses, ancient civilizations, supernatural powers, spiritual experiences, bizarre cases, different dimensions, and urban legends, told in a picture show style. The anime seeks to evoke the retro atmosphere of pulp horror stories that were popular in the 60s and 70s in magazines.

Source: ANN

2017-04-03.name: Washimo (2017)
2017-04-03.desc: * Based on Wasimo, a picture book by screenwriter Kudou Kankurou and illustrator Anzai Hajime.

2017-04-04.name: Frame Arms Girl
2017-04-04.desc:
* Based on Kotobukiya's Frame Arms Girl model kit line.

Gennai Ao mistakenly opens a package that wasn't meant for her, and, to her surprise, she sees a small robot named Gourai, a Frame Arms Girl who has an evolving personality. Confused as to how this little robot made it into her life, she finds out that she is the first person to activate her. She realizes taking care of Gourai is harder than she thought, especially when competitive fights are involved!

Source: animenetwork

2017-04-04.name: Idolmaster Cinderella Girls Gekijou
2017-04-04.desc:
Our IDOL friends are back again today! Get a rare look at how IDOLS spend their days off, as well as their comical interactions with each other in this hyper-fun-filled short anime.

Source: crunchyroll

2017-04-04.name: Shounen Ashibe: Go! Go! Goma-chan (2017)
2017-04-04.desc:
* Based on light novel series written by Hitsuji Tarou and illustrated by Mishima Kurone.

The Alzano Imperial Magic Academy is located in the southern part of the Alzano Empire,and is among most prominent magic schools in the world, where students can learn the highest forms of magic. All those who strive to learn magic dream of studying at this academy, and its students as well as its teachers are proud to be a part of its 400-year history. Glenn Radars is a new instructor who has suddenly been appointed to teach part-time at this highly respected academy. The previously unheard-of lessons of this man known as a good-for-nothing bastard are about to begin.

Source: crunchyroll

2017-04-05.name: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
2017-04-05.desc:
The Hidden Leaf Village has entered an era of peace and modernity. Tall buildings line the streets, giant screens flash with images, and the Thunder Rail runs through the village, connecting each district together. Though it's still a ninja village, the number of civilians has increased and the life of the shinobi is beginning to change.

Uzumaki Boruto, son of Seventh Hokage Uzumaki Naruto, has enrolled in the Ninja Academy to learn the ways of the ninja. The other students are ready to dismiss him as "just the son of the Hokage," but Boruto's heart and character blow all their assumptions away.

As a series of mysterious events begins to unfold, it's up to Boruto and his new friends to handle them. Like a gale-force wind, Boruto makes his own way into everyone's hearts; his story is about to begin!

Source: crunchyroll

2017-04-05.name: Happy Party Train
2017-04-05.desc: Music video included with the third single for the Love Live! Sunshine!! anime idol group Aqours.

2017-04-05.name: Makeruna!! Aku no Gundan!
2017-04-05.desc:
The "Evil Corps," led by Don, are on a mission to conquer the universe. They set out to invade Earth first, but they struggle as some quirky Earthlings stand in their way. Eventually Don's plan to invade Earth becomes distorted...?! This wacky slice-of-life sci-fi comedy stars a team of aliens you just can't hate and lots of unique Earthlings!

Source: crunchyroll

2017-04-05.name: Oushitsu Kyoushi Heine
2017-04-05.desc:
The "Royal Tutor" is a special tutor carefully selected for the task of teaching the prince, and a title given only to the best teacher in the nation. Heine Wittgenstein has been called to the kingdom of Grannzreich to take on the role of the Royal Tutor. He's been ordered to raise a worthy candidate for the throne, but he's greeted with four princes of completely different, unique personalities... all brothers, no less! How will Heine handle these four brothers who were too much for all the previous Royal Tutors, prompting them all to run away from the job?

Source: crunchyroll

2017-04-05.name: Sakura Quest
2017-04-05.desc:
Five girls work in the tourism bureau of their small provincial town. The town revives its "micro-nation" tourism program, which originated from a nationwide movement during Japan's bubble economy period, and hires the five girls as "monarchs" (tourism ambassadors).

Note: The first episode was streamed on Amazon Japan one day ahead of TV broadcast.

2017-04-07.name: Ahare! Meisaku-kun (2017)
2017-04-07.desc: Note: An all-new anime short episode included in a selection theatrical screening of the anime series together with main episodes for each of the six Matsuno brothers from the television anime series and the Osomatsu-san: Ouma de Kobanashi special.

2017-04-07.name: Clockwork Planet
2017-04-07.desc:
This news may seem sudden... but this world died long ago.

Earth died a thousand years ago, and a legendary clockmaker known only as "Y" rebuilt it using clockwork. Naoto Miura, a failing high school student, encounters RyuZU, an automaton that "Y" left behind, and the genius clockmaker Marie. When the abilities of these three come together, the gears of fate begin to turn. The cycle of failure and success repeats endlessly as the three of them work to repair the endangered "Clockwork Planet" in this clockpunk fantasy!

Source: crunchyroll

2017-04-07.name: Panpaka Pants O New-san
2017-04-07.desc:
Kurusu Kurogo, a high school boy who loves the art of kabuki to the point it is annoying, yearns to perform kabuki for a club, but his school doesn't have one. Kurogo decides to create his own and sets out to gather members.

Source: English Wikipedia

2017-04-07.name: Ren`ai Boukun
2017-04-07.desc:
A Kiss Note is a powerful notebook that makes anyone who have their names written together instantly fall in love if they kiss each other. This magical item belongs to an angel named Guri whose job as cupid is to create couples. However, she accidentally writes down Aino Seiji, a regular high school student, and unless he kisses someone in the course of 24 hours, Guri will die, and Seiji will remain a virgin for the rest of his life.

Eventually, Guri convinces Seiji to kiss his crush, Hiyama Akane, the school's popular girl who turns out to be a yandere, with her feelings for Seiji bordering on obsessive and psychotic. To make the matters worse, after Akane and Seiji become a couple, Guri decides that she likes Seiji as well. Now, what seems awesome to most guys becomes hell for Seiji who just wants a normal relationship with a girl.

Source: MangaHelpers

2017-04-07.name: Seikai Suru Kado
2017-04-07.desc:
Shindou Koujirou is a highly-skilled negotiator working for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. As his plane at Haneda airport prepares to take off, a huge mysterious cube appears from the sky. "It" expands rapidly, and absorbs the passenger plane and its 252 passengers.

The cube's name is "Kado".

A strange being called Yaha-kui Zashunina appears from within Kado and tries to make contact with humanity. Shindou, who was been absorbed by Kado, ends up taking on the role of mediator between Yaha-kui Zashunina and humanity. The Japanese government sends its own negotiator, Tsukai Saraka. Who is Yaha-kui Zashunina? What does he want?

Source: crunchyroll

Note: The first episode was digitally distributed by Amazon Prime Video one day before the regular TV broadcast. The first three episodes screened on a special event on April 2nd

2017-04-07.name: Twin Angel Break
2017-04-07.desc:
Amatsuki Meguru is a girl who innocently aspires to be a hero of justice and the cool Kisaragi Sumire who grew up in the strict Kisaragi household... The two girls who are in their 3rd year of middle school end up getting orders from a mysterious hedgehog named Miruku-chan and turn into Twin Angels in order to fight evil! Meguru is always cheerful but sometimes a bit too forceful. Meanwhile, Sumire isn't accustomed with being around others. Despite their differences, as they work together, they start opening up to each other.

Source: crunchyroll

2017-04-07.name: Yoru wa Mijikashi Aruke yo Otome
2017-04-07.desc:
* Based on a novel by Morimi Tomihiko.

A black haired girl is walking around the streets of Kyoto, from the night scene of Pontocho to a second-hand book fair in Shimogamo, then off to a college fair. The main character that has a romantic feeling for her secretly follows her around and looks for the opportunities to run into her in a manner that seems like a coincidence. Unfortunately for him, she is not interested in love yet so she does not notice his feelings. What waits these two characters are crazy incidents caused by individuals such as a person who introduces himself as a Japanese mythical creature Tengu, the god of second-hand book or the money lender in a three story vehicle.

Source: Sugoi Japan

2017-04-08.name: Nobunaga no Shinobi: Ise Kanegasaki Hen
2017-04-08.desc:
The year is 1555, the middle of the Warring States period, and one young man holds on to a very big dream. That young man, known as an empty-headed fool, is none other than Oda Nobunaga. Enchanted by his dream, a certain young girl who admires Nobunaga swears that she will become his ninja one day. Nobunaga has one goal: to unify Japan by military might! Decorated by a colorful cast of characters, including the airheaded Kichou, the errand boy Hideyoshi, the tsundere Nene, the straight man Mitsuhide, and the half-dead Hanbei, this heavy-hitting wartime gag anime is about to begin!!

Source: crunchyroll

2017-04-08.name: Shingeki no Bahamut: Virgin Soul
2017-04-08.desc:
10 years after the world escaped destruction due to the revival of Bahamut, humans at the royal capital gather wealth, the demons are enslaved to assist with the capital's revival, and the gods lose their power due to a decrease in religious piety. The world is thrown off balance as humans, gods, and demons hold their own ideas of justice.

Source: ANN

2017-04-09.name: ID-0
2017-04-09.desc:
I-Machines are the general term for robots that operate in extreme environments. While Alliance Academy student Mikuri Maya is in the middle of operating an I-Machine, she gets involved in an incident with pirates, and ends up serving as a crew member on an excavation company's spaceship.

Source: ANN

2017-04-10.name: Yousei Land Mukashibanashi
2017-04-10.desc: Note: Aired as part of the Anime-chan ni Kaeru Kuni (アニメちゃんに会える国) television variety program on Japan's Tokyo MX1 channel.

2017-04-11.name: Fukumenkei Noise
2017-04-11.desc:
The anime tells a romance story with the themes of "music x one-sided love." Nino, a girl who loves singing, made a childhood promise with her first crush Momo and song-composing Yuzu to someday find her voice. The three went their separate ways, but Nino kept her promise and continued to sing. Years later, the three are now high school students, and Nino is drawn into the world of band clubs.

Source: ANN

Note: Episode 1 was screened in advance at Anime Boston (USA) on April 1.

2017-04-12.name: Kakuchou Shoujo Kei Trinary
2017-04-12.desc:
The story takes place in the world on the other side of the screen, where the capital city of Tokyo is beset by frequent calamities known as Phenomenon. To prevent these events, a special team of superpowered heroines known as Trinary is formed. By linking with the Clan (people who play the smart phone game and watch the anime), the Trinary team can power up for battle.

Source: Crunchyroll

Note: Episode 1 was pre-aired at a special event in Shinjuku on 16.09.2016.

2017-04-12.name: Natsume Yuujinchou Roku
2017-04-12.desc:
Precious days with kinds friends. A beautiful yet fleeting story about people and spirits. Natsume Takashi had been able to see youkai ever since he was young and inherited his grandmother Reiko's Book of Friends. He spends his days with his self-proclaimed bodyguard Nyanko-sensei and freeing the youkai that were bound to the book. Natsume continues to find ways to protect the precious days where he tries to find which path to follow through his connections with spirits and those involved with them and being helped out by friends who share the same feelings.

Source: crunchyroll

2017-04-13.name: The Snack World
2017-04-13.desc:
Room Mate is a "first-person anime" from the perspective of a female protagonist opposite three male neighbors.

Source: crunchyroll

2017-04-15.name: 100% Pascal-sensei (2017)
2017-04-15.desc:
The story centers around an elementary school teacher who is so stupid that he cannot even write his own name. He does whatever he likes in his classroom. Plus, by all appearances, he is not human.

Source: ANN

2017-04-15.name: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darouka Gaiden: Sword Oratoria
2017-04-15.desc:
Sword princess Aiz Wallenstein. Today, once again, the strongest female swordsman heads to the giant labyrinth known as the "Dungeon" along with her allies. On the 50th floor where mysteries and threats such as a decayed dragon's corpse that crumbles to ash and an irregularity that creeps ever closer to the party loom, Aiz calls for the wind and heads deeper into the darkness of the Dungeon. Eventually, she finds herself meeting a boy for the first time. "Um, are you OK?" In the Labyrinth City of Orario, the contrasting stories of the boy and the girl intersect!

Source: ANN

2017-04-15.name: Meitantei Conan: Kara Kurenai no Love Letter
2017-04-15.desc:
Sword princess Aiz Wallenstein. Today, once again, the strongest female swordsman heads to the giant labyrinth known as the "Dungeon" along with her allies. On the 50th floor where mysteries and threats such as a decayed dragon's corpse that crumbles to ash and an irregularity that creeps ever closer to the party loom, Aiz calls for the wind and heads deeper into the darkness of the Dungeon. Eventually, she finds herself meeting a boy for the first time. "Um, are you OK?" In the Labyrinth City of Orario, the contrasting stories of the boy and the girl intersect!

Source: ANN

2017-04-15.name: Sin: Nanatsu no Taizai
2017-04-15.desc:
The prideful archangel Lucifer disobeys God and is cast into the lowest level of hell as a fallen angel. On her way to hell, Lucifer happens to meet a high school girl on Earth named Maria, who helps her. In hell, Lucifer meets Leviathan, and Leviathan explains to Lucifer about The Seven Deadly Sins, the seven demon king rulers of hell. After The Seven Deadly Sins seal Lucifer's powers, Lucifer goes on a journey with Maria and Leviathan to defeat them.

Source: ANN

2017-04-19.name: Koushui Sanguo 2
2017-04-19.desc:
* Inspired by Takara Tomy's long-running Tomica line of miniature toy cars.

In the future, just a little after the present day... To respond to disasters beyond human comprehension and the increasing complexity of crime and mishaps, the mobile emergency police Hyper Rescue (an organization newly formed by the government primarily for life-saving) developed Drive Heads that are specialized with police, fire-fighting, and rescue capabilities.

Drive Heads are special vehicles that change from car forms to humanoid walker vehicles. The grade schooler Kurumada Gou and other children found to be suitable become drivers and join forces with the mobile emergency police and other adults. Even now, they race to the scene to protect the peace and security of all humanity. Go Rescue!

Source: ANN

2017-04-19.name: T7S: Longing for Summer Again and Again - Harukaze
2017-04-19.desc: An animated music video for the song Harukaze ~You were here~, bundled with the single t7s Longing for summer Again And Again ~Harukaze~ of the Tokyo 7th Sisters game idol group 777☆SISTERS.

2017-04-22.name: Gekijouban Free! Timeless Medley
2017-04-22.desc: Note: The first movie retells the events of (mostly) Free! Eternal Summer from Haruka and the Iwatobi Swim Club's point of view, while the second movie focuses on Rin and the Samezuka swimming team's story.

2017-04-28.name: Arad: Suming Zhi Men
2017-04-28.desc: Note: The Japanese TV version started on 06.01.2018.

2017-04-28.name: Eiga Tamagotchi Himitsu no Otodoke Daisakusen!
2017-04-28.desc: Note: The Japanese TV version started on 06.01.2018.

2017-04-28.name: Nui Nui Hinobori San Kyoudai
2017-04-28.desc:
* Based on SunRise's plush and goods line by the same name.

The series will center on the three Hinobori brothers, who run a stuffed toy shop called "Nui Nui" at the end of Tokyo's Kappabashi shopping street. The eldest brother Kaede is the manager, the second son Aoi is in charge of patterns, and the third son Akane is in charge of displays.

Source: ANN
